skills.title: MERN Stack
skills.description: Leveraging MongoDB for database management, Express.js for backend application frameworks, React.js for building dynamic user interfaces, and Node.js for server-side JavaScript runtime.

skills.title: Blockchain
skills.description: Utilizing Solidity for smart contracts, JavaScript with React.js for frontend development, Hardhat for development tasks, and Ethers.js for blockchain interaction.

skills.title: Database
skills.description: Managing data using MySQL for relational database management, MongoDB for NoSQL database solutions, and Firebase for real-time database capabilities.

skills.title: Programming
skills.description: Proficient in C, C++, and JavaScript, I specialize in implementing Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA) with a strong foundation in Object-Oriented Programming (OOP).

Technologies: Firebase for real-time database and user authentication

description.Platform: Web 3.0 application that allows users to send transactions through the blockchain
Benefits: Send and receive Ethereum transactions using MetaMask
Attach personalized messages and GIFs with each transaction
View past transactions in real-time on the blockchain

Technologies: Pug for templating, CSS for styling
